channel.title: I am back
channel.description:
Hello Mopar Community,
I would like to announce that I am now back at Mopar. I was banned and I have changed. I am back now to stay. If you know me, send me a pm to chat. I love it here and hope to stay.

item.title: I am back
item.dc:creator: @alex4ever alex4ever
item.description:
@alex4ever wrote:

[quote=“Mrquarter, post:1, topic:103790”]Hello Mopar Community,

I would like to announce that I am now back at Mopar. I was banned and I have changed. I am back now to stay. If you know me, send me a pm to chat. I love it here and hope to stay.[/quote]welcome back to the moparscape community

Read full topic

item.title: I am back
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:52, topic:103790”][quote author=Eh Pretty Easy link=topic=148416.msg1431715#msg1431715 date=1180986943]
Everyone who has their own name for CM is stupid. All they care about is rep and to become a mod or cm. Imo everyone on moparscape should get their rep resetted.
[/quote]
Stfu, if moparscape gets resetted im sure moparisthebest aswell lol,
Also if 1 person is abusing the rep system everyone should get reset?
Wow let me abuse it on moparisthebest and lets laugh if everyone here gets reset?

Nah just reset the person abusing it and ban him like y0u g0t pk3d[/quote]
Nice point. I would have put that but I am trying to be nice lol. Anyway, thanks for saying that. Glad I am back!

Read full topic

item.title: I am back
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

Wow, your really 2-faced. First you say that you will never change, and now you say that you won’t stop me? Confused much? Oh well, and btw, I have already changed. I made a mistake and had 4 months of ban to think about it.

Read full topic

item.title: I am back
item.dc:creator: @daycrawler daycrawler
item.description:
@daycrawler wrote:

[quote=“Mrquarter, post:45, topic:103790”]Daycrawler…guess what…I never was a freaking scammer. Never scammed once.

Also, never ever did I post on MITB so you must not know me…

And Stroud, your just a loser. So go away.[/quote]
Nope. I don’t waste my time at the moparscape forums. If your willing to change then I’m not going to halt your progress.

Read full topic

item.title: I am back
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

[quote=“zoltanman, post:43, topic:103790”][quote author=daycrawler link=topic=148416.msg1428310#msg1428310 date=1180922792]

Yup, had to be him. Nice warning!

I don’t remember you but your reputation holds you as a scammer and a password stealer and in my book that makes your look like a 2 year old. Scamming pixels that means absoultely nothing. You’ll try and change but you’ll never get full respect after what you did. Yes, I was around. Check the date. Also, Nice try to say your were kidding with the CM stuff after pwnd told you off.
[/quote]

quit thinking rep is all about popularity and shit.[/quote]
what the hell… he didnt mention rep, he said reputation, like what people think of you…

TheBeanie:

Stroud stfu. Everyone makes mistakes You have been here less then 2 weeks and your already pissing people off. mrquarter was and in my eyes is a respected member of the forums. You however are just a nobody. so quit the flaming or gtfo

wow…that was awsome…

Read full topic
